subject: Re: [R] How to specify the start position using plot
body:
plot( x=rnorm(25, 0.5, 0.3), y=rnorm(25, 4, 1), xlim=c(0,1), ylim=c(2,7)) 
#                                               ^^^^^        ^^^^^     
for example
